translations: [印刷]复印机；影印机；抄写员；模仿者（copier 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The new copiers only copy onto one side of the paper.
sentences.translation: 这批新复印机只能复印到单面纸上。

sentences.sentence: He made contact with someone with an idea for reconditioning laser copiers.
sentences.translation: 他联系了一个懂得修理激光复印机的人。
